body: Do we want copies to be atomic? I just noticed our GCS RandomAccessFile impl doesn't lock-in the [generation](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/generations-preconditions). Can we do that @dbcode? If that can happen soon, I don't see any reason to block this PR.
body_html: Do we want copies to be atomic? I just noticed our GCS RandomAccessFile impl doesn't lock-in the generation. Can we do that @dbcode? If that can happen soon, I don't see any reason to block this PR.
